aboutMessage: For many years now I have had a great passion for capturing a moment in time and sharing the beauty of that moment with the world. I enjoy taking pictures for many varying events. When I am not doing photo shoots you will find me preforming English tutoring, or practicing my other passion, surfing.
description: Photography Business Website for Masha Eltsova Photography

servicesMessage: I am willing to negotiate other requested services, however the below are what I primarily offer: Baby Portraits,Family Portraits,Self-Portraits,Engagements,Weddings
title: Masha Eltsova Photography
